thread.title: Family escapes St. Albans house fire
thread.title_full: Family escapes St. Albans house fire - WCAX.COM Local Vermont News, Weather and Sports-

author: wcax.com
title: Family escapes St. Albans house fire
text:
ST. ALBANS, Vt. (AP) - The American Red Cross says it responded to a house fire in St. Albans that displaced two adults and four children.
The Red Cross said Friday it is meeting with the residents and will assist with lodging, food and other essentials.
The cause of the fire wasn't immediately known.
